name: MageCastleDefense
description: You play as a mage trapped in a destroyed castle and the only way to survive is to complete all the waves. Please note this game is in very early access! This project is being developed by one developer, any help with the development process is greatly appreciated. If you enjoy what you are playing please support me and follow my GitHub for updates, https://github.com/lhurt51. If you find any bugs or have problems downloading please make an issue on GitHub or contact me on my email liamhurt51@gmail.com.
